channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Fall
item.description: European natural-gas prices fall below €40 a megawatt hour for the first time since early November on strong LNG flows, higher wind power generation a...

item.title: Cruise Lines Are Basking in Holiday Cheer
item.description: This “wave season” is shaping up to be not only the strongest since the pandemic but also the best ever.

item.title: Honeywell stock hits all-time high as it weighs aerospace-unit sale
item.description: Honeywell draws support for a strategic review from Elliott management as airlines and defense sectors scale up.

item.title: The Social Security Fairness Act is a bad idea
item.description: This legislation would allow some workers to double-dip and speeds the exhaustion of the trust fund

item.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Rise and Bitcoin Rallies
item.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite nudged higher but the Dow Jones Industrial Average was roughly flat after falling for its seventh straight session.

item.title: The Social Security Fairness Act is incredibly irresponsible
item.description: Instead of being fair, this legislation will lead to harsher and faster automatic benefit cuts for most of us.

item.title: U.S. oil prices edge lower on weak Chinese retail-sales data
item.description: Oil prices headed lower Monday as concerns over the outlook for energy demand were renewed by a batch of economic data in China that showed retail-sal...

item.title: Treasury Yields Decline as Markets Await Fed Cut
item.description: Treasury yields fell, while staying range-bound, ahead of an expected 25-basis-point interest rate cut by the Fed this week.

item.title: Tesla’s stock may see a 50% bump as Musk’s ‘bet for the ages’ on Trump pays off
item.description: Tesla’s stock heads for another record, as Wedbush sees a “bull case” possibility of a rally to $650 in 2025.

item.title: Dollar Expected to Remain Strong Against Major Currencies
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index hovered around recent highs Monday. The greenback is likely to get support from the Fed if Wall Street’s expectation of a more ha...
